skills.name: Pyrolytic Cleaning
skills.description: Commands all [Dirtexpellers] to continuously revolve around Hilda and fire [Hyperthermal Purgejets], during which the duration for all [Light Dirtexpellers] pauses. [Hyperthermal Purgejets] deal Pyro Damage to enemies, and defeating an enemy has a chance to restore Sanity for Hilda during the [Hyperthermal Purgejets] firing.

skills.name: Wholehearted Service
skills.description: Deals Pyro Damage to surrounding enemies And inflicts [Disarm] on them. For each target hit, summons 1 [Light Dirtexpeller] around Hilda and resets the duration timer for all [Light Dirtexpellers] Carries 2 [Heavy Dirtexpellers] around. [Heavy Dirtexpellers] and [Light Dirtexpellers] automatically target and shoot nearby enemies once every 3s, dealing Pyro Damage. A Maximum of 6 [Light Dirtexpellers] can exist at the same time. [Disarm]: Permanently disables ranged weapons.

skills.name: Automatic Sanitizing
skills.description: Carries 2 [Heavy Dirtexpellers] that automatically target and shoot nearby enemies once every 3s, dealing Pyro Damage. When dodging, Hilda reloads her ranged weapon Magazine to a maximum and gains [Elegant Anger] for a period of time. [Elegant Anger]: Increases the ATK Speed of [Dirtexpeller], the Rotation Speed of [Pyrolytic Cleaning] and the ATK Speed of ranged weapons.
